str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A bridegroom. From numphe; a bride-groom.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To delay, tarry, linger, spend time. From chronos; to take time, i.e. Linger.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To nod in sleep, be drowsy, slumber. From a presumed derivative of neuo; to nod, i.e. to fall asleep; figuratively, to delay.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To sleep, be sleeping. From kata and heudo; to lie down to rest, i.e. to fall asleep.
